name: You're Doing it Wrong 😉 - Materials from Config 2022
description:
Doing it wrong can be something to celebrate. Design systems aren’t one-size-fits-all. At HBO Max we live in an ever growing landscape of devices, languages, and user experiences. We’ve redefined what design systems mean in our world. From different ways to think of onboarding, to a series of workflows, automations, and connection points for team togetherness, our system is built for the unique way we work. We’re embracing our “wrong” because it feels so right.


Whatever stage of maturity your team’s design system is at, it’s easy to feel like everyone else has it figured out. We’re sharing some of the lessons we've learned along the way.
